short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves the user experience of the University of Melbourne handbook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attention all University of Melbourne students!

Tried of not having all subject information on the same page in the handbook? Want to be able to quickly see everything you need?

Well this extension is for you! Handy Handbook Tool automatically loads all subject information for you, re purposing the crappy sidebar into a way to instantly scroll to whichever section of the subject information you want!

Currently looking for someone to help out with the graphics, if you'd like to please submit your interest here: https://goo.gl/forms/cb2UvWVQTueMsLej2

Thanks Amanda Chang for thinking up the snazzy name!
